property.name: Height
property.label: Component Height
property.description: Display height for this component (pixels). Enter -1 to set height to 100% (i.e., the height required to avoid scrollbars).

property.name: SuppressHeader
property.label: Suppress Header
property.description: Check this box to hide the header area of this component.

property.name: SuppressFooter
property.label: Suppress Footer
property.description: Check this box to hide the footer / diagnostics area of this component.

property.name: SuppressModeTools
property.label: Suppress Tools Accordion
property.description: Check this box to hide the 'accordion' area that contains the Guides menu etc.

property.name: SuppressInlineEdit
property.label: Suppress In-line Editing
property.description: Check this box to hide editing 'pencil' icons / suppress inline editing availability, regardless of CRUD rights.

property.name: sobjectname
property.label: Object API Name
property.description: API Name of the object whose data is to be displayed. Leave blank to have Salesforce supply this automatically.

property.name: LayoutName
property.label: Layout Name
property.description: API Name of the page layout to use in creating this form: For standard objects, this setting can be left blank if you wish to use the layout applicable to the current user profile and record type. For custom objects, a value is required and will often be in the form: '[Object API name]-[Object label] Layout'.

property.name: DisplayDensity
property.label: Display Density
property.description: Controls how much white space to display around the fields in this component.

property.name: DefaultSectionToggleState
property.label: Default Form Section State
property.description: Controls whether form sections are expanded or collapsed when first visited by a user (prior to them opening/closing sections as they wish).

property.name: InitialSections
property.label: Initial Sections to Display
property.description: The number of form sections to display when first loading the page. Set a lower number to improve loading speed on lengthy forms. Set to zero to load all sections.

property.name: CurrentRecTypeId
property.label: Record Type ID
property.description: (New records only) ID of the Record Type to create when adding new records via the Autoform. Leave blank unless creating Autoforms for flows etc and specialised handling is required.

property.name: PopulatedFields
property.label: Override Field Values
property.description: Enter [Field API Name]Â¬[Field Value]| to default fields when adding new records.

property.name: LimitFields
property.label: Fields to Show
property.description: Enter a comma-separated list of field API names to display only those fields, if permitted by the page layout in use.

property.name: CalloutOption
property.label: Callout Option
property.description: Controls how to respond to helped item clicks.
property.datasource: Topic Selected Event Only,Topic Selected Event plus Topic view
property.default: Topic Selected Event plus Topic view

property.name: CalloutStyle
property.label: Callout Style
property.description: Controls whether to show callouts embedded in the Autoform or stand alone, filling the full component area until closed.

property.name: OnSaveAction
property.label: Action on Saving
property.description: Controls the action to take after successfully saving a record on this form.

property.name: ComponentId
property.label: Component ID
property.description: A reference name for this component, used in conjunction with the 'Listens To' parameter.
